name: Playgroup
subtitle: Reclaim the Album. Restore Music.
description: We're a rebellion against surface-level streaming. Playgroup is a community dedicated to restoring music's soulâ€”where albums are journeys, not commodities. shortDescription: Revive music. One full album at a time.
